net.proteusframework.core.lang

Class ClassPathResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.lang.ClassPathResources

  • public class ClassPathResources
extends java.lang.Object
    ClassPath Resources Utility.

    This requires jar files to be indexed.

    This was written before spring was a dependency, so you may also want to consider using ResourcePatternResolver.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

      • findResources

        protected void findResources(java.net.URL baseJarURL,
                             java.util.jar.JarFile jar,
                             java.lang.String jarPath,
                             java.util.List<java.net.URL> matchedResources,
                             ClassPathResources.Filter filter)
        Find the resources that match the filter.
        Parameters:
        baseJarURL - the jar URL.
        jar - the jar file to search.
        jarPath - the file path in the jar to limit the search.
        matchedResources - the matched resources.
        filter - the filter.
